scripts.start: echo 'Attempting to install Python and Django if not available...' && (apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip || apk add --no-cache python3 py3-pip || echo 'Failed to install Python with package managers') && (pip3 install django==4.2.11 djangorestframework==3.14.0 gunicorn==21.2.0 || pip install django==4.2.11 djangorestframework==3.14.0 gunicorn==21.2.0 || echo 'Failed to install Django packages') && export PYTHONPATH='/app:/app/backend:$PYTHONPATH' && export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE='expert_system.settings' && (python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT || python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT || echo 'Failed to start Django server - please check deployment configuration')
